title: Lawn Mowing
description: Mow a lawn for a little old lady

title: Camp Korey Grow Dinner Waiter
description: Help support a local charity that benefits children with life altering illneseses at the annual Grow Dinner. Help our event go smoothly by helping the chefs serve food

title: UW City Church Feed for Homeless
description: Come help out at the UW City Church on the first Tuesday of every month! We will be serving dinner to homeless people in the U-District area. Come support your community!
